module.p:
Corpus examples –
Tha An Comunn Gaidhealach a’ bruidhinn air Seanaileir ùr a thaghadh a bhios os cionn obair a’ Chomuinn. [...] Cha b’ fhuilear do dhuine de ’n t-seòrsa so tomhas mhath de chumhachd a bhith aige. [...] Bhiodh a leòr aige ri dhèanamh an toiseach ag ath-nuadhachadh dreach a’ Chomuinn. Tha móran ri dhèanamh ris a’ Mhòd mus beir e air linn an telebhisean, no eadhon air linn an réidio [...]
The Highland Society is talking about choosing a new General who will oversee the Society’s work. [...] A person of this kind would have to have a good measure of power. [...] He would have enough to do initially reforming the Society. There is much to do at the Mod before it catches up with ?? the era of television, or even with the era of radio [...] td. 105, ‘Air an Spiris’
